extension.name: Muscol - JW Player
extension.author: JoomlaThat!
extension.description: JW Player for Music Collection component.

field.name: show_add_to_playlist
field.label: Show add to playlist button
field.description: Must be set to YES if you want people to be able to create playlists to be reproduced on JW Player MODULE for Music Collection

field.name: width
field.label: Width
field.description: Forces width of the player (for 'One player per song' mode)

field.name: height
field.label: Height
field.description: Forces height of the player (for 'One player per song' mode)

field.name: playlist
field.label: Show playlist
field.description: To show the playlist on the album player

field.name: playlistsize
field.label: Playlist size
field.description: Height or width of the playlist

field.name: skin
field.label: Skin
field.description: Load a Skin for the JW Player 6.8. Just type the name of the skin
